venue.question: Where is the event taking place?
venue.answer: The event takes place at the Palais des Congrès de Paris. The address is: 2 Place de la Porte Maillot, 75017 Paris, France

transport.question: Do you organize transportation to the event?
transport.answer: We do not organize transportation, each participant organizes their own logistics.

accommodation.question: Where can I stay?
accommodation.answer: Accommodation options are available around the conference venue. We encourage you to use sites like booking.com or airbnb.com to find the solution that suits you.

food.question: Will I be able to buy food at the conference?
food.answer: There will be a fast food outlet at the conference. You will also find restaurants and supermarkets in town.

program.question: What is the program?
program.answer: The days start at 9:00 and end around 22:00. Breaks between sessions and for meals are planned. Since the schedule is constantly changing until the last moment, we are unable to provide details on the content or the dates and times of the various speakers.

price.question: What is the price?
price.answer: The 3-day pass for an adult is €100 until March 31, 2024, then €130 from August 1, 2024. Child and day rates are detailed on the link to buy tickets.

refund.question: I want to get a refund for my ticket, how does that work?
refund.answer: For any refund request, you must send an email to info@puentesparis2025.net from the email box that was used to purchase the tickets. You must specify the name, first name and order number. The refund will be made without the fees of the ticket purchasing platform which are not refundable. No refund request will be accepted less than 15 days before the event.

video.question: Can the conference be followed by video remotely?
video.answer: Yes the conference will be broadcast live on video in French and English, register here to receive the link.
